longBusinessSummary: GFL Limited operates and manages multiplexes and cinema theatres under the INOX brand in India. It also engages in the real estate and property development activities, as well as distribution of investment products. The company was formerly known as Gujarat Fluorochemicals Limited and changed its name to GFL Limited in July 2019. GFL Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Mumbai, India. GFL Limited was formerly a subsidiary of Inox Leasing and Finance Limited.
